# Non-Static Variables
storage_account = 'stoeaesola'
use_test_env = False

# Here is a JavaScript selector that you try to run in browser console on the Canvas Data Documentation for identifying entities
# Its a crude DOM query so it may need tweeking 
# console.log([...document.querySelectorAll("h2 a[name]")].reduce((accumulator, item, index) => accumulator + "'" + item.innerHTML + "',", ""))
canvas_entities = [
    'assignment_fact',
    'assignment_group_fact'
    #,'assignment_group_score_fact','assignment_override_fact','assignment_override_user_fact','assignment_override_user_rollup_fact','catalog_order_fact','catalog_order_item_fact','catalog_payment_fact','catalog_product_fact','catalog_program_requirement_fact','catalog_promotion_fact','communication_channel_fact','conference_fact','conference_participant_fact','conversation_message_participant_fact','course_score_fact','course_ui_navigation_item_fact','discussion_entry_fact','discussion_topic_fact','enrollment_fact','external_tool_activation_fact','file_fact','grading_period_fact','grading_period_score_fact','group_fact','group_membership_fact','learning_outcome_fact','learning_outcome_group_association_fact','learning_outcome_group_fact','learning_outcome_question_result_fact','learning_outcome_result_fact','learning_outcome_rubric_criterion_fact','module_completion_requirement_fact','module_fact','module_item_fact','module_prerequisite_fact','module_progression_completion_requirement_fact','module_progression_fact','pseudonym_fact','quiz_fact','quiz_question_answer_fact','quiz_question_fact','quiz_question_group_fact','quiz_submission_fact','quiz_submission_historical_fact','submission_comment_fact','submission_fact','submission_file_fact','wiki_fact','wiki_page_fact','account_dim','assignment_dim','assignment_group_dim','assignment_group_rule_dim','assignment_group_score_dim','assignment_override_dim','assignment_override_user_dim','assignment_rule_dim','catalog_applicant_dim','catalog_dim','catalog_enrollment_dim','catalog_order_dim','catalog_order_item_dim','catalog_payment_dim','catalog_product_dim','catalog_product_tag_dim','catalog_promotion_dim','catalog_tag_dim','catalog_user_registration_dim','communication_channel_dim','conference_dim','conference_participant_dim','conversation_dim','conversation_message_dim','course_dim','course_score_dim','course_section_dim','course_ui_canvas_navigation_dim','course_ui_navigation_item_dim','discussion_entry_dim','discussion_topic_dim','enrollment_dim','enrollment_rollup_dim','enrollment_term_dim','external_tool_activation_dim','file_dim','grading_period_dim','grading_period_group_dim','grading_period_score_dim','group_dim','group_membership_dim','learning_outcome_dim','learning_outcome_group_dim','learning_outcome_question_result_dim','learning_outcome_result_dim','learning_outcome_rubric_criterion_dim','module_completion_requirement_dim','module_dim','module_item_dim','module_prerequisite_dim','module_progression_completion_requirement_dim','module_progression_dim','pseudonym_dim','quiz_dim','quiz_question_answer_dim','quiz_question_dim','quiz_question_group_dim','quiz_submission_dim','quiz_submission_historical_dim','role_dim','submission_comment_dim','submission_dim','user_dim','wiki_dim','wiki_page_dim','requests',
]

# Here is a JavaScript selector that you try to run in browser console on the Canvas Data Documentation for each entity to make it easier to derive the columns
# Its a crude DOM query so it may need tweeking 
# For each table change a[name='TABLE_NAME_GOES_HERE'] to match your table
# console.log([...document.querySelectorAll("h2 a[name]")].reduce((accumulator, item, index) => accumulator + [...document.querySelector("a[name='" + item.innerHTML + "']").closest("div.row").querySelectorAll(".schema-docs tbody tr td:first-of-type")].reduce((accumulator2, item2, index2, original) => accumulator2 + "_c" + index2 + " " + item2.innerHTML + (index2+1 < original.length ? ", " : ""), "'") + "',\n", ""))

'_c0 assignment_id, _c1 course_id, _c2 course_account_id, _c3 enrollment_term_id, _c4 points_possible, _c5 peer_review_count, _c6 assignment_group_id, _c7 external_tool_id',
'_c0 assignment_group_id, _c1 course_id, _c2 group_weight',
]

canvas_entity_columns_to_anonymize = ['id']

# Production / Test Environment Toggle
if use_test_env:
    stage1 = 'abfss://test-env@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net/stage1'
    stage2 = 'abfss://test-env@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net/stage2'
    stage3 = 'abfss://test-env@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net/stage3'
else:
    stage1 = 'abfss://stage1@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net'
    stage2 = 'abfss://stage2@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net'
    stage3 = 'abfss://stage3@' + storage_account + '.dfs.core.windows.net'

# Process Stage 2 Entity
# Convert from Tab Delimited CSV to Parquet
# Save in stage 3 container

def processStage2Entity(entityName, entityColumns):
    df = spark.read.option("delimiter", "\t").csv(stage1 + f'/canvas/{entityName}.csv', header='false')
    if (df.count() > 0):
        sqlContext.registerDataFrameAsTable(df, entityName)
        df = spark.sql(f"select {entityColumns} from {entityName}")
        df.write.format("parquet").mode("overwrite").save(stage2 + f'/canvas/{entityName}')

# Create spark db to allow for access to the data in the delta-lake via SQL on-demand.
# This is only creating metadata for SQL on-demand, pointing to the data in the delta-lake.
# This also makes it possible to connect in Power BI via the azure sql data source connector.
def create_spark_db(db_name, source_path, canvas_entity):
    spark.sql('CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS ' + db_name)
    spark.sql("create table if not exists " + db_name + f".{canvas_entity} using PARQUET location '" + source_path + f"/{canvas_entity}'")

index = 0;
db_prefix = 'test_' if use_test_env else ''

for canvas_entity in canvas_entities:
    print("Processing Canvas Entity: " + canvas_entity)
    processStage2Entity(canvas_entity, canvas_entity_columns[index])
    processStage3Entity(canvas_entity, canvas_entity_columns[index])
    create_spark_db(db_prefix + 's2_canvas', stage2 + '/canvas', canvas_entity)
    create_spark_db(db_prefix + 's3_canvas', stage3 + '/canvas', canvas_entity)
    index += 1
